title: Flow Free
description:
Flow Free® is a simple yet addictive puzzle game. Connect matching colors with pipe to create a Flow®. Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in Flow Free. But watch out, pipes will break if they cross or overlap!

Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode. Flow Free gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give Flow Free a try, and experience "mind like water"!

Flow Free features:

★ Over 1,500 free puzzles
★ Free Play and Time Trial modes
★ Clean, colorful graphics
★ Fun sound effects

Special thanks to Noodlecake Studios, creators of Super Stickman Golf, for their work on Flow Free!

Enjoy.
short_desc: The #1 hit app. Simple and addictive puzzle game. Flow Free® today!
what_is_new:
New Pack for all you Flow Free Fans! Flex your muscles on the new Interval Pack!
Achievements with Google Play Games! Start off as a Rookie and climb your way through the ranks up to Champion Plumber. Achievements for all level packs and daily streaks also!
Cloud syncing! Save and sync your game progress across multiple devices.
Various minor fixes and improvements.
Enjoy!
